channel.title: How do I edit accounts?
channel.description:
How do I edit accounts? By edit I mean change stats, change if they are a F2P, P2P, an Admin, or a MOD, or just a normal player.
I am using Divine PK V5.0

item.title: How do I edit accounts?
item.dc:creator: @i_own_you21 i own you21
item.description:
@i_own_you21 wrote:

both wrong
it is
1 premium (its changed to 0 in player.java)
2 = mod
3 = admin
4 = owner(thats how it is on mine)( i made it like that on my server )

Read full topic

item.title: How do I edit accounts?
item.dc:creator: @freaky5000 freaky5000
item.description:
@freaky5000 wrote:

1 Is normal f2p player…
2 p2p player
3 moderator
4 administrator

“I’m not to sure if these are correct i think they are havn’t used demonik src in a while”.

Read full topic

item.title: How do I edit accounts?
item.dc:creator: @Zian Zian
item.description:
@Zian wrote:

[quote=“adu, post:4, topic:236761”]Goto

http://localhost/phpmyadmin

Click your databse

Click ‘user_credenials’

Click browse on the top

Find the name you want

Edit it

Change the rank

Click go in the bottom[/quote]

ok now what are all the ranks again?
1 is a normal player?
2 is a MOD?
3 is an Admin? and if i missed any others please add them in thanks.

(I know there is a list some where with that info. on it but i lost track of where it is)

Read full topic

item.title: How do I edit accounts?
item.dc:creator: @adu adu
item.description:
@adu wrote:

Goto

http://localhost/phpmyadmin

Click your databse

Click ‘user_credenials’

Click browse on the top

Find the name you want

Edit it

Change the rank

Click go in the bottom

item.title: How do I edit accounts?
item.dc:creator: @Zian Zian
item.description:
@Zian wrote:

[quote=“adu, post:2, topic:236761”]That is done through the database, ‘user_credentials’

Change their to:

  1. Reg Player
  2. P2p Player
  3. Mod
  4. Admin

I think, havent used divine in ages.[/quote]

Ok I see that, but I am talking about editing all ready existing users. I don’t see any of the names for the 2 accounts I have made.

did you mean the demonik_lsd.sql?
or
Databasemanager?

Read full topic
